title: Post-Close QC Review Process - Screen Recording
description: Screen recording of QC analyst performing a post-close quality control review on a recently funded loan. Demonstrates the QC checklist, Encompass audit trail review, document verification steps, and finding documentation process.
presenter: Maria Santos, VP Underwriting (performing QC review)
redaction_notes: QC performed on test loan MNB-TEST-001; no actual borrower data

scene_segments.description: QC checklist overview and loan selection criteria
TRID compliance check - LE/CD timing verification
Audit trail review for condition clearing
